Class QueryFilterBuilder

Namespace
Ddap.Rest.Filters
Assembly
Ddap.Rest.dll

Builds dynamic LINQ queries from OData-like filter expressions. Supports basic comparison operators and logical operators.

public static class QueryFilterBuilder
Inheritance
object
QueryFilterBuilder
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Examples

var query = dbContext.Users.AsQueryable();

// Apply filter: "age gt 18 and status eq 'active'"
query = QueryFilterBuilder.ApplyFilter(query, "age gt 18 and status eq 'active'");

// Apply sorting: "name desc"
query = QueryFilterBuilder.ApplyOrdering(query, "name desc");

var results = await query.ToListAsync();

Methods

ApplyFilter<T>(IQueryable<T>, string)

Applies a filter expression to the queryable. Supports operators: eq, ne, gt, ge, lt, le, contains, and, or

public static IQueryable<T> ApplyFilter<T>(IQueryable<T> query, string filterExpression)

Parameters

query IQueryable<T>

The queryable to filter.

filterExpression string

The filter expression.

Returns

IQueryable<T>

The filtered queryable.

Type Parameters

T

The entity type.

Examples

var filtered = QueryFilterBuilder.ApplyFilter(users, "name eq 'John' and age gt 25");

ApplyOrdering<T>(IQueryable<T>, string)

Applies ordering to the queryable. Supports single or multiple sort fields with asc/desc direction.

public static IQueryable<T> ApplyOrdering<T>(IQueryable<T> query, string orderByExpression)

Parameters

query IQueryable<T>

The queryable to sort.

orderByExpression string

The order by expression.

Returns

IQueryable<T>

The sorted queryable.

Type Parameters

T

The entity type.

Examples

var sorted = QueryFilterBuilder.ApplyOrdering(users, "name asc, age desc");
